alert.note: Alert for Taylor (Texas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS San Angelo (Central Texas San Angelo)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued May 14 at 5:41PM CDT by NWS San Angelo
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of northeastern Taylor County through 630 PM CDT... At 540 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Tye, moving southeast at 15 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph and nickel size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Abilene, Wylie, Tye, Tuscola, Buffalo Gap, Potosi, View, Caps, Dyess Afb, Camp Tonkawa and Kirby Lake. This includes Interstate 20 between Mile Markers 272 and 284. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.88 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
